content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (no other drill found) 

### Copper cable factory
No factory found

### Electricity generator at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=117.5, y=-30.5), boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0) and offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)
- The steam engine is not connected.
- The boiler has no fuel.

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5) and transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)
- Both belts are working.

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner equipment
- Ensure that burner equipment has fuel before using it.
- Examples of burner equipment include burner mining drills and burner inserters.

### Errors when using steam engines
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to a boiler and a power network before using them.

### Errors when using furnaces
- Ensure that furnaces have ingredients before using them.
- Examples of furnaces include stone furnaces.

### Errors when using offshore pumps
- Ensure that offshore pumps are connected to a boiler before using them.

### Errors when using inserter equipment
- Ensure that inserter equipment has source items before using it.
- Examples of inserter equipment include burner inserters.

### Errors when using belt systems
- Ensure that belt systems are properly connected before using them.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions defined by the agent are found in the logs.
No important variables assigned by the agent are found in the logs.
